scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Adoration of the Magi. The Virgin Mary, seated and holding the Christ Child, is attended by two of the Magi who kneel and offer gifts. A third Magus stands behind them, also holding a gift. They are positioned in front of a simple, stone building with a thatched roof and a single arched window. To the right, a landscape unfolds with trees and a distant castle. The figures are richly dressed, and the gifts are depicted as golden vessels.
